backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features related to replacing and rendering the AVANTIA - W (2).png logo in the Hero section with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their functionality, styling, and recent fixes including the Hero section with the updated logo.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for the design system including primary, secondary, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'Avantia', and script reference to the React application mounted at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that renders the complete landing page structure including Hero, About, Services, WhyChoose, CTASection, Contact, Footer, and FloatingWhatsApp components.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component describing Avantia's Monterrey location and values (Strategy, Creativity, Growth, Results) with animated icon cards and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with a comprehensive form (name, company, WhatsApp, email, message), direct WhatsApp button linking to 8124070421, contact information card, and social media links including Instagram.
frontend/src/components/CTASection.tsx: Call-to-action section with blue #004AAD background encouraging users to schedule a free consultation, featuring a prominent button that scrolls to the contact form.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Fixed floating WhatsApp button positioned at bottom-right with green #25D366 background, pulse animation, and link to WhatsApp number 8124070421.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Avantia branding, Monterrey location, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with solid #004AAD background featuring the AVANTIA - W (2).png logo, main headline, subtitle, two CTA buttons (strategy request and WhatsApp contact), and animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section component displaying five marketing service cards (social media management, digital advertising, branding, web development, marketing strategies) with icons, titles, descriptions, and hover animations using Avantia's #004AAD brand color.
frontend/src/components/WhyChoose.tsx: WhyChoose section component showcasing four differentiators (personalized strategies, measurable results, direct attention, local market experience) with icons from lucide-react and animated cards in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages Internet Computer actor creation using React Query, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for ICP integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for Avantia's #004AAD brand, dark mode support, and custom animation utilities (fade-in, slide-in) for smooth page transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component with necessary context providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH, container settings, extended shadows, Inter font family, and accordion animations with typography and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Avantia's landing page architecture, brand colors (#004AAD), contact information (WhatsApp: 8124070421), and completed features including hero, services, about, and contact sections.
